A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The film was above average in cinematography\, sound\, lighting etc but the narrative was given so many chances to really give the fans what they wanted and create jaw dropping moments. This didnt happen.

Alot of the plot was just strung up from previous episodes and made into a different context with different characters.

Yes there was a feeling of nostalgia and that was epic but Disney just had to go and add these animals in for humour\, which get more screen time than key characters to the entire franchise.This really killed the vibe as it made the film more 'funny' than how serious the fans wanted it to be. 
It many kep plot points and shouldnt be aided with this childish humour\, it should be serious\, because it is.

This franchise means somethnig to people\, for some it has been their entire life. Disney has ruined an amazing franchise with their demographic grabbing marketing\, toys and bad narrative.
